thread.section_title: Euroflorist Deutschland Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von Euroflorist Deutschland | euroflorist.de
thread.title: Drunkonius Chivalrous
thread.title_full: Euroflorist Deutschland bewertet von Drunkonius Chivalrous

author: Drunkonius Chivalrous
title: Drunkonius Chivalrous
text: I have to assume a team of men delivered the flowers, because they were on time, rapid response, accurate, and didn't ask for directions. The handwritten note I included for my love was written in a very feminine scrawl though, which was odd. Still, excellent job, men!
